title: Sales of smart home devices and controllers to dealers in the U.S. 2014 to 2017
summary: The statistic shows the dealers of various segments of the smart home devices ( VPN ) controllers worldwide in 2014 with a forecast to 2017 .
In 2017 , the dealers of the multiprotocol label switching VPN controllers is expected to grow from 1.4 billion U.S. dollars to 3.1 billion U.S. dollars worldwide .
Overall , the U.S. VPN controllers is valued at 45 billion U.S. dollars in 2014 and forecast for 70 billion U.S. dollars in 2017 .
